author: Dominick Meglio
releaseNotes:
Added the ability to turn debug logging on/off.
Added the ability to uninstall multiple packages at once.
Added the ability to specify what time update checking occurs and receive a notification of new updates available.
Added an auto-updater.
Added version numbers to the view apps/drivers screen.
Fixed a bug where the view apps page was showing optional components that weren't actually installed.
